movies.title: Kono sora no hana: Nagaoka hanabi monogatari

biography.bio: Akira Emoto was born on November 3, 1948 in Ginza, Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi (2003), Shin Godzilla (2016) and Dr. Akagi (1998).
biography.name: Akira Emoto

biography.bio: Junko Fuji was born on December 1, 1945 in Gobo, Wakayama, Japan as Junko Shundô. She is an actress, known for The Geisha House (1998), Buddies (1989) and Air Doll (2009).
biography.name: Junko Fuji

biography.bio: Yasuko Matsuyuki was born on November 28, 1972 in Saga, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hula Girls (2006), Vexille (2007) and Monday (2000).
biography.name: Yasuko Matsuyuki

biography.bio: Masahiro Takashima was born on October 29, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II (1993), Jipangu (1990) and Gunhed (1989). He has been married to Sylvia Grab since July 17, 2005.
biography.name: Masahiro Takashima

biography.bio: Misako Renbutsu is an actress, known for Switching - Goodbye Me (2007), The Snow White Murder Case (2014) and From Me to You (2010).
biography.name: Misako Renbutsu

biography.bio: Shiho Fujimura was born on January 3, 1939 in Kanagawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Zatoichi's Cane-sword (1967), Inugami, l'esprit du mal (2001) and Ninja, a Band of Assassins (1962).
biography.name: Shiho Fujimura

biography.bio: Toshie Negishi, who has been in dozens of supporting roles in Japanese films since 1977, was in fact revealed by the theater when she was 21 (in 'Kohei Tsuka''s hit play "Stripper Monogatari"). Faithful to the playwright she was also in several of his other plays. Her most notable appearances in films were for Shôhei Imamura ("Vengeance is Mine", 1979; "Akai no shita no nurui mizu", 2001) and Akira Kurosawa ("Dreams", 1990; "Rhapsody in August", 1991).
biography.name: Toshie Negishi

biography.bio: Tsurutarô Kataoka was born on December 21, 1954 in Tokyo, Japan as Toshio Hagino. He is an actor, known for Kamen Rider Drive (2014), The Discarnates (1988) and Sada (1998).
biography.name: Tsurutarô Kataoka

biography.bio: Natsuki Harada was born on July 7, 1984 in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan. She is an actress, known for Kono sora no hana: Nagaoka hanabi monogatari (2012), Ôoka Echizen (2013) and Keiji Shoot 4 (2013).
biography.name: Natsuki Harada

biography.bio: Takashi Sasano was born on June 22, 1948 in Awaji, Japan. He is an actor, known for Departures (2008), Love and Honour (2006) and Bright Future (2002).
biography.name: Takashi Sasano

biography.bio: Masayuki Yui was born in 1947 in Kamakura, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for Ran (1985), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Maadadayo (1993).
biography.name: Masayuki Yui

biography.bio: Toshinori Omi was born on December 7, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Hachi-ko (1987), I Are You, You Am Me (1982) and Le samouraï du crépuscule (2002).
biography.name: Toshinori Omi

biography.bio: Saki Terashima is an actress, known for Cinderella Formula (2007), The Cherry Orchard: Blossoming (2008) and The Reason (2004).
biography.name: Saki Terashima

biography.bio: Mansaku Ikeuchi was born on March 27, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Jumper (2008), Shutters 4 (2009) and Lizard Baby (2004).
biography.name: Mansaku Ikeuchi

biography.bio: Hiroshi Inuzuka was born on March 23, 1929 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Un ga yokerya (1966), Daigoro vs. Goliath (1972) and Hotsprings Holiday (1970).
biography.name: Hiroshi Inuzuka
